page.title: 11 A DENTON CRAFT ENTERPRISE
page.content: We moved to Denton eight years ago having bought a derelict old farmhouse needing the kind of modernisation that involves blocking up the holes in roof and walls. We enjoyed making things and looked forward to restoring it to its former splendour despite having a toddler and a three weeks old baby. Recently the house was finished and I found the time to learn several new crafts,purely as a relaxing hobby. With my three children at school, however,I decided to turn my interests into a small business. I coined the name,"Suzybee Crafts",and decided to sell my work through the party system offering as much choice as a small craft shop.(Cont'd on P.12)
